```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(png)
install.packages("ggpubr")
library(ggpubr)
library(readr)

Data <- read_tsv("0224.dat", comment = "#" , col_names = FALSE) %>%
  separate(X1, c("R", "V"), sep = "\\s+", convert = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(R.ly = V *3261.56)


backgroundImage <- readPNG("Andromeda_image.png")


Plot1 <- ggplot(Data, aes(x=R.ly, y=V)) + 
background_image(backgroundImage)+
geom_line() +
geom_segment(aes(x = R.ly, xend = lead(R.ly), y = V, yend=lead(V), color = ifelse(R.ly >= 0 & R.ly <= 27000, "lightblue", "lightgreen"))) +
scale_color_identity(guide = "none") +
geom_label(x=10000, y=270, label="ascending", color = "black", size=3, family="Arial", fill="lightblue") +
geom_label(x=75000, y=270, label="remaining", color="black", size=3, family = "Arial", fill="lightgreen")+
theme_classic()

```
